description:
My place is close to 230 Fifth, Bathtub Gin, Penelope, AMC Loews Kips Bay 15, and Café Grumpy. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Center Location Cozy 2 bedroom 1 bathroom with Balcony. This launching pad is great spot to be in. Good size bedrooms, Living-Room with Sofa-bed to accommodate two extra guests and a fully equipped Kitchen, with all utilities included, WIFI, and Cable TV plus more:

★ Bedroom Number 1 includes:

• Queen size Bed 
• Night Stand 
• Extra bed sheets and towels 
• Iron with board

Bathroom Number 2 includes:
• Full Size Bed 
• Extra bed sheets and towels 
• Closet

Bathroom Includes :
• Full Bathtub. 
• Blow-dryer. 
• Shampoo & Soaps. 
• Fresh towels.

★ Living-room:

• Pull out sofa Bed 
• Air Conditioner
• Television With Cable
• Telephone (Local Calls Only)
★ kitchen includes:

• Refrigerator 
• Gas Stove 
• Kitchen Sink
• Microwave.

To My Entire Apartment and Balcony

As often as needed I typically respond to all inquiries within the hour

An epicenter for ambitious professionals, Midtown East is home to many of Manhattan's best-dressed corporate experts. Wall Street entrepreneurs and 9-to-5 weekend warriors call this high-rise neighborhood home. Although Midtown East is all business by day, its residential community makes a strong evening showing at its myriad restaurants and bars. Outside of the bar scene, Midtown East is home to choice boutiques for the shopping-savvy.

6 Train located on 33rd street & Park avenue - 5 min walk 
6 Train located on 28th street & Park avenue-5 min walk

JFK Airport: 30 minutes by cab without traffic
LaGuardia Airport: 20 minutes by cab without traffic
Times Square: 13 minutes by subway
Wall Street / Financial District: 22 minutes by subway

Check in is at 2:00 pm & check out is at 11:00 am please keep this in mind when booking your flights. YOU WILL BE SUBJECTED TO A LATE CHECK-IN FEE IF YOU ARRIVE PAST 8:00 PM
name: Center of Manhhaten 2Bedrooms / Sleep 6 / Balcony
